entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
